${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:AbsolutePower.NAME: Absolute Power
${modID}:AbsolutePower.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]  every time an attack's damage ends in a 9.

${modID}:BadMemory.NAME: Bad Memory
${modID}:BadMemory.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Add a *Freak *Bullet to your hand.

${modID}:BurntPan.NAME: Burnt Pan
${modID}:BurntPan.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Temp HP equal to the unblocked damage dealt.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Convert this card's friskmod:XP to friskmod:LV.

${modID}:DogShrine.NAME: Dog Shrine
${modID}:DogShrine.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! card. NL Draw cards equal to its friskmod:XP.
${modID}:DogShrine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Draw cards equal to their friskmod:XP.

${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.NAME: Flurry Of Knives
${modID}:FlurryOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be Upgraded any number of times.

${modID}:FreakBullet.NAME: Freak Bullet
${modID}:FreakBullet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This card always has at least !M! friskmod:XP.

${modID}:LevelUp.NAME: Level Up
${modID}:LevelUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your hand with friskmod:XP for the rest of combat.
${modID}:LevelUp.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upgrade ALL your cards in your deck with friskmod:XP for the rest of combat.

${modID}:LoveSaver.NAME: Love Saver
${modID}:LoveSaver.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you would lose friskmod:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.
${modID}:LoveSaver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next !M! times you would lose friskmod:LV. NL Deal !D! damage.

${modID}:Plead.NAME: Plead
${modID}:Plead.DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to the enemy. NL That enemy deals less damage for their friskmod:LV this turn.
${modID}:Plead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If you have Block, give your Block to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies deal less damage for their friskmod:LV this turn.

${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.NAME: Scales Of Justice
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ScalesOfJustice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Steal.NAME: Steal
${modID}:Steal.DESCRIPTION: Steal ALL enemies' Block and buffs.
${modID}:Steal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Steal ALL enemies' Block and buffs. Trustworthy
